    2138                 :            :                 "\nUpdates list of temporarily unspendable outputs.\n"
    2139                 :            :                 "Temporarily lock (unlock=false) or unlock (unlock=true) specified transaction outputs.\n"
    2140                 :            :                 "If no transaction outputs are specified when unlocking then all current locked transaction outputs are unlocked.\n"
    2141                 :            :                 "A locked transaction output will not be chosen by automatic coin selection, when spending bitcoins.\n"
    2142                 :            :                 "Locks are stored in memory only. Nodes start with zero locked outputs, and the locked output list\n"
    2143                 :            :                 "is always cleared (by virtue of process exit) when a node stops or fails.\n"
    2144                 :            :                 "Also see the listunspent call\n",

    3147                 :            :                 "\nAdd inputs to a transaction until it has enough in value to meet its out value.\n"
    3148                 :            :                 "This will not modify existing inputs, and will add at most one change output to the outputs.\n"
    3149                 :            :                 "No existing outputs will be modified unless \"subtractFeeFromOutputs\" is specified.\n"
    3150                 :            :                 "Note that inputs which were signed may need to be resigned after completion since in/outputs have been added.\n"
    3151                 :            :                 "The inputs added will not be signed, use signrawtransactionwithkey\n"
    3152                 :            :                 " or signrawtransactionwithwallet for that.\n"
    3153                 :            :                 "Note that all existing inputs must have their previous output transaction be in the wallet.\n"
    3154                 :            :                 "Note that all inputs selected must be of standard form and P2SH scripts must be\n"
    3155                 :            :                 "in the wallet using importaddress or addmultisigaddress (to calculate fees).\n"
    3156                 :            :                 "You can see whether this is the case by checking the \"solvable\" field in the listunspent output.\n"
    3157                 :            :                 "Only pay-to-pubkey, multisig, and P2SH versions thereof are currently supported for watch-only\n",
    3158                 :            :                 {
    3159         [ +  - ]:         70 :                     {"hexstring", RPCArg::Type::STR_HEX, RPCArg::Optional::NO, "The hex string of the raw transaction"},
    3160         [ +  - ]:         70 :                     {"options", RPCArg::Type::OBJ, RPCArg::Optional::OMITTED_NAMED_ARG, "for backward compatibility: passing in a true instead of an object will result in {\"includeWatching\":true}",
    3161                 :            :                         {
    3162                 :            :                             {"changeAddress", RPCArg::Type::STR, /* default */ "pool address", "The bitcoin address to receive the change"},
    3163                 :            :                             {"changePosition", RPCArg::Type::NUM, /* default */ "random", "The index of the change output"},
    3164                 :            :                             {"change_type", RPCArg::Type::STR, /* default */ "set by -changetype", "The output type to use. Only valid if changeAddress is not specified. Options are \"legacy\", \"p2sh-segwit\", and \"bech32\"."},
    3165                 :            :                             {"includeWatching", RPCArg::Type::BOOL, /* default */ "true for watch-only wallets, otherwise false", "Also select inputs which are watch only.\n"
    3166                 :            :                                                           "Only solvable inputs can be used. Watch-only destinations are solvable if the public key and/or output script was imported,\n"
    3167                 :            :                                                           "e.g. with 'importpubkey' or 'importmulti' with the 'pubkeys' or 'desc' field."},
    3168                 :            :                             {"lockUnspents", RPCArg::Type::BOOL, /* default */ "false", "Lock selected unspent outputs"},
    3169   [ +  -  +  -  :        143 :                             {"feeRate", RPCArg::Type::AMOUNT, /* default */ "not set: makes wallet determine the fee", "Set a specific fee rate in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + "/kB"},
                   -  + ]
    3170                 :            :                             {"subtractFeeFromOutputs", RPCArg::Type::ARR, /* default */ "empty array", "The integers.\n"
    3171                 :            :                             "                              The fee will be equally deducted from the amount of each specified output.\n"
    3172                 :            :                             "                              Those recipients will receive less bitcoins than you enter in their corresponding amount field.\n"
    3173                 :            :                             "                              If no outputs are specified here, the sender pays the fee.",
    3174                 :            :                                 {
    3175         [ +  - ]:         70 :                                     {"vout_index", RPCArg::Type::NUM, RPCArg::Optional::OMITTED, "The zero-based output index, before a change output is added."},
    3176                 :            :                                 },
    3177                 :            :                             },
    3178                 :            :                             {"replaceable", RPCArg::Type::BOOL, /* default */ "wallet default", "Marks this transaction as BIP125 replaceable.\n"
    3179                 :            :                             "                              Allows this transaction to be replaced by a transaction with higher fees"},

    3342                 :            :                 "\nBumps the fee of an opt-in-RBF transaction T, replacing it with a new transaction B.\n"
    3343                 :            :                 "An opt-in RBF transaction with the given txid must be in the wallet.\n"
    3344                 :            :                 "The command will pay the additional fee by reducing change outputs or adding inputs when necessary. It may add a new change output if one does not already exist.\n"
    3345                 :            :                 "All inputs in the original transaction will be included in the replacement transaction.\n"
    3346                 :            :                 "The command will fail if the wallet or mempool contains a transaction that spends one of T's outputs.\n"
    3347                 :            :                 "By default, the new fee will be calculated automatically using estimatesmartfee.\n"
    3348                 :            :                 "The user can specify a confirmation target for estimatesmartfee.\n"
    3349   [ +  -  +  -  :        199 :                 "Alternatively, the user can specify a fee_rate (" + CURRENCY_UNIT + " per kB) for the new transaction.\n"
             -  +  -  + ]
    3350                 :            :                 "At a minimum, the new fee rate must be high enough to pay an additional new relay fee (incrementalfee\n"
    3351                 :            :                 "returned by getnetworkinfo) to enter the node's mempool.\n",
    3352                 :            :                 {
    3353         [ +  - ]:         98 :                     {"txid", RPCArg::Type::STR_HEX, RPCArg::Optional::NO, "The txid to be bumped"},
    3354         [ +  - ]:         98 :                     {"options", RPCArg::Type::OBJ, RPCArg::Optional::OMITTED_NAMED_ARG, "",
    3355                 :            :                         {
    3356                 :            :                             {"confTarget", RPCArg::Type::NUM, /* default */ "wallet default", "Confirmation target (in blocks)"},
    3357   [ +  -  +  -  :        199 :                             {"fee_rate", RPCArg::Type::NUM, /* default */ "fall back to 'confTarget'", "fee rate (NOT total fee) to pay, in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " per kB\n"
                   -  + ]
    3358                 :            :             "                         Specify a fee rate instead of relying on the built-in fee estimator.\n"
    3359   [ +  -  +  -  :        199 :                                      "Must be at least 0.0001 " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " per kB higher than the current transaction fee rate.\n"},
             -  +  -  + ]
    3360                 :            :                             {"replaceable", RPCArg::Type::BOOL, /* default */ "true", "Whether the new transaction should still be\n"
    3361                 :            :             "                         marked bip-125 replaceable. If true, the sequence numbers in the transaction will\n"
    3362                 :            :             "                         be left unchanged from the original. If false, any input sequence numbers in the\n"
    3363                 :            :             "                         original transaction that were less than 0xfffffffe will be increased to 0xfffffffe\n"
    3364                 :            :             "                         so the new transaction will not be explicitly bip-125 replaceable (though it may\n"
    3365                 :            :             "                         still be replaceable in practice, for example if it has unconfirmed ancestors which\n"
